notes.text: A use-after-free security bug in rpcbind was fixed which could lead to a remote denial of service.
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: Use-after-free vulnerability in xprt_set_caller in rpcb_svc_com.c in rpcbind 0.2.1 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (daemon crash) via crafted packets, involving a PMAP_CALLIT code.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
